SELECT CRP.COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_ID , CRP.POST_WRITER , CRP.POST_TITLE , CRP.POST_CONTENT , CRP.POST_DATE , CRP.RECRUIT_START_DATE , CRP.RECRUIT_END_DATE , CRP.RECRUIT_PROGRESS_YN , CRP.RECRUIT_TYPE , CRP.MIN_CAREER_YEAR , CRP.MAX_CAREER_YEAR , CRP.VIEW_CNT , CRP.LIKE_CNT , CRP.DELETE_YN , M.NICKNAME FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST CRP INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = CRP.POST_WRITER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST (COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_ID , POST_WRITER , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_DATE , RECRUIT_START_DATE , RECRUIT_END_DATE , RECRUIT_PROGRESS_YN , RECRUIT_TYPE , MIN_CAREER_YEAR , MAX_CAREER_YEAR , VIEW_CNT , LIKE_CNT , DELETE_YN) VALUES ( 'CR-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{postWriter} , #{postTitle} , #{postContent} , #{postDate} , #{recruitStartDate} , #{recruitEndDate} , 'Y' , 'CC-20231017-000014' , #{minCareerYear} , #{maxCareerYear} , 0 , 0 , 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT CRP.COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_ID , CRP.POST_WRITER , CRP.POST_TITLE , CRP.POST_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CRP.POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') POST_DATE , TO_CHAR(CRP.RECRUIT_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RECRUIT_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(CRP.RECRUIT_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RECRUIT_END_DATE , CRP.RECRUIT_PROGRESS_YN , CRP.RECRUIT_TYPE , CRP.MIN_CAREER_YEAR , CRP.MAX_CAREER_YEAR , CRP.VIEW_CNT , CRP.LIKE_CNT , CRP.DELETE_YN FROM COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST CRP INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = CRP.POST_WRITER WHERE COMPANY_RECRUIT_POST_ID = #{_parameter}
